translations: 仪式的，礼节的；（职务）礼仪性的，象征性的

sentences.sentence: The visit was conducted with all due ceremonial.
sentences.translation: 访问按照一切应有的礼仪进行。

sentences.sentence: He represented the nation on ceremonial occasions.
sentences.translation: 他在礼仪场合代表着国家。

sentences.sentence: Up to now the post of president has been largely ceremonial.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，总统职位在很大程度上是礼仪性的。
